import sys

N = int(sys.stdin.readline())
S = sys.stdin.readline().rstrip()
print(S.count("ABC"))

n = int(input())
s = input()
count = 0
for i in range(n - 2):
    if s[i] == "A" and s[i + 1] == "B" and s[i + 2] == "C":
        count += 1
print(count)


n, k = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

a_min = min(a)
a_max = max(a)

if k <= a_max - a_min:
    print(a_min + k)
else:
    print(a_max + k - (a_max - a_min))

n = int(input())
s = input()

count = 0

for i in range(n - 2):
    if s[i] == "A" and s[i + 1] == "B" and s[i + 2] == "C":
        count += 1

print(count)
